verses.verse: Come <WG71> now<WG3568>, ye rich<WG4145>, weep<WG2799> and howl<WG3649> for<WG1909> your<WG5216> miseries<WG5004> that are coming upon you<WG1904>.
Your <WG5216> riches<WG4149> are corrupted<WG4595>, and<WG2532> your<WG5216> garments<WG2440> are<WG1096> moth-eaten<WG4598>.

Your <WG5216> gold<WG5557> and<WG2532> your<WG5216> silver<WG696> are rusted<WG2728>; and<WG2532> their<WG846> rust<WG2447> shall be<WG2071> for a testimony<WG3142> against<WG1519> you<WG5213>, and<WG2532> shall eat<WG5315> your<WG5216> flesh<WG4561> as fire<WG4442>. Ye have laid up your treasure<WG2343> in<WG1722> the last<WG2078> days<WG2250>.

Behold <WG2400>, the hire<WG3408> of the laborers<WG2040> who<WG3588> mowed<WG270> your<WG5216> fields<WG5561>, which is of<WG575> you<WG5216> kept back by fraud<WG650>, crieth<WG2896> out<WG2532>: and the cries<WG995> of them<WG3588> that reaped<WG2325> have entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the ears<WG3775> of the Lord<WG2962> of Sabaoth<WG4519>.

Ye have lived delicately<WG5171> on<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>, and<WG2532> taken your pleasure<WG5171>; ye have nourished<WG5142> your<WG5216> hearts2588, 5613 in<WG1722> a day<WG2250> of slaughter<WG4967>.
Ye have condemned<WG2613>, ye have killed<WG5407> the righteous<WG1342> one<WG498>; he doth not<WG3756> resist<WG498> you<WG5213>.

Be patient<WG3114> therefore<WG3767>, brethren<WG80>, until<WG2193> the coming<WG3952> of the Lord<WG2962>. Behold<WG2400>, the husbandman<WG1092> waiteth for<WG1551> the precious<WG5093> fruit<WG2590> of the earth<WG1093>, being patient<WG3114> over<WG1909> it<WG846>, until2193, Leviticus2 it receive<WG2983> the early<WG4406> and<WG2532> latter<WG3797> rain<WG5205>.
Be <WG3114> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> patient<WG3114>; establish<WG4741> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588>: for<WG3754> the coming<WG3952> of the Lord<WG2962> is at hand<WG1448>.

Murmur <WG4727> not<WG3361>, brethren<WG80>, one against<WG2596> another<WG240>, that ye be not<WG3361> judged<WG4253>: behold<WG2400>, the judge<WG4253> standeth<WG2476> before<WG3588> the doors<WG2476>.

Take <WG2983>, <WG3450> brethren<WG80>, for an example<WG5262> of suffering<WG2552> and<WG2532> of patience<WG3115>, the prophets<WG4396> who<WG3739> spake<WG2980> in the name<WG3686> of the Lord<WG2962>.

Behold <WG2400>, we call<WG3106> them<WG3588> blessed<WG3106> that endured<WG5278>: ye have heard<WG191> of the patience<WG5281> of Job<WG2492>, and<WG2532> have seen<WG1492> the end<WG5056> of the Lord<WG2962>, how that<WG3754> the Lord<WG2962> is<WG2076> full of pity<WG4184>, and<WG2532> merciful<WG3629>.

But <WG1161> above<WG4253> all things<WG3956>, my<WG3450> brethren<WG80>, swear<WG3660> not<WG3361>, neither<WG3383> by the heaven<WG3772>, nor<WG3383> by the earth<WG1093>, nor<WG3383> by any<WG5100> other<WG243> oath<WG3727>: but<WG1161> let<WG2277> your<WG5216> yea<WG3483> be<WG2277> yea<WG3483>, and<WG2532> your nay<WG3756>, nay<WG3756>; that<WG2443> ye fall<WG4098> not<WG3361> under<WG1519> judgment<WG3956>.
Is <WG2553> any<WG5100> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> suffering<WG2553>? Let him pray<WG4336>. Is<WG2114> any<WG5100> cheerful<WG2114>? Let him sing praise<WG5567>.

Is <WG770> any<WG5100> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> sick<WG770>? Let him call<WG4341> for the elders<WG4245> of the church<WG1577>; and<WG2532> let them pray<WG4336> over<WG1909> him<WG846>, anointing<WG218> him<WG846> with oil<WG1637> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of the Lord<WG2962>:

and <WG2532> the prayer<WG2171> of faith<WG4102> shall save<WG4982> him that is sick<WG2577>, and<WG2532> the Lord<WG2962> shall raise<WG1453> him<WG846> up<WG1453>; and if<WG2579> he have<WG5600> committed<WG4160> sins<WG266>, it shall be forgiven<WG863> him<WG846>.

Confess <WG1843> therefore your sins<WG3900> one to another<WG240>, and<WG2532> pray<WG2172> one<WG240> for<WG5228> another<WG240>, that<WG3704> ye may be healed<WG2390>. The<WG1754> supplication<WG1162> of a righteous man<WG1342> availeth<WG2480> much in its working<WG4183>.

Elijah <WG2243> was<WG2258> a man<WG444> of like passions<WG3663> with<WG2254> us<WG2532>, and he prayed<WG4336> fervently<WG4335> that it might<WG1026> not<WG3361> rain<WG1026>; and<WG2532> it rained<WG1026> not<WG3756> on<WG1909> the earth<WG1093> for three<WG5140> years<WG1763> and<WG2532> six<WG1803> months<WG3376>.
And <WG2532> he prayed<WG4336> again<WG3825>; and<WG2532> the heaven<WG3772> gave<WG1325> rain<WG5205>, and<WG2532> the earth<WG1093> brought forth<WG985> her<WG846> fruit<WG2590>.
My brethren<WG80>, if<WG1437> any<WG5100> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> err<WG4105> from<WG575> the truth<WG225>, and<WG2532> one<WG5100> convert<WG1994> him<WG846>;

let him know<WG1097>, that<WG3754> he who converteth<WG1994> a sinner<WG268> from<WG1537> the error<WG4106> of his<WG846> way<WG3598> shall save<WG4982> a soul<WG5590> from<WG1537> death<WG2288>, and<WG2532> shall cover<WG2572> a multitude<WG4128> of sins<WG266>.
